channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cold Pool Lane gullies, 2nd December
item.description:
Hello, could someone drive down Cold Pool Lane and review the state of the gullies please ? Whilst the Badgeworth Bridge remains out of action, the gullies in many places along much of the lane are being ripped up by the increased traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street sign for houses in cul-de-sac, 2nd December
item.description:
We live in a cul-de-sac off Delavale Road in winchcombe. We’re finding that people/deliveries etc are having real trouble finding us and having to drive up and down the road before they realise where we are. The neighbours are having the same issue I was wondering if it was possible to have a sign installed at the end of the road to say Delavale Road numbers 44-54? The road is only going to get busier with the new development and there is a sharp blind bend directly after us so I think this could be a real help with finding us first time and avoiding doubling back all the time. I imagine emergency services may have the same issue. If someone could help us with this we would really appreciate it. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Delavale Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole in road filled with water, 2nd December
item.description:
Between Moors Ave and Brook Road, Hole in road with water that is spilling onto main road persistently. In the left hand carriageway heading towards the roundabout, .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 2nd December
item.description:
Customer reported that entire street affected by streetlight outage and is concerned at likelihood of burglaries as a result. Advised customer that there have been several reports to this effect; streetlighting team is aware. Customer reported that he has previously flagged-up same issue, but unable to locate last Enquiry under his name. Poor connection at time of call - unable to obtain full contact info.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water has been pouring out from this manhole cover for about ten days, the water is sheeting over gardens and causing problem lower down Haymes Drive. If the weather gets cold the water freezes causing a sheet of ice on Hahmes Drive which is a health and safety issue as cars are liable to slide out of contral., 2nd December
item.description:
The mahole is outside Cleeve Hill House.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury
